verses.verse: A Psalm of David. A statement of Jehovah to my Lord: Sit at My right hand, until I place Your enemies as Your footstool.
Jehovah shall send the rod of Your strength out of Zion to rule in the midst of Your enemies.
Your people shall have willingnesses in the day of Your strength; in the majesties of holiness; from the womb of the dawn, to You is the dew of Your youth.
Jehovah has sworn and will not repent: You are a priest forever according to the order of Melchizedek.
The Lord at Your right hand shatters kings in the day of His anger.
He shall judge among the nations; He shall fill with corpses; He shall shatter heads over much land.
He shall drink out of the torrent on the way; on account of this, He shall lift up the head.
